original_text: On the way to Egypt, there was a place where people could rest on their journey. The Lord met Moses there and he wanted to kill Moses.
korean_text: 모세가 길을 가다가 숙소에 있을 때에 여호와께서 그를 만나사 그를 죽이려 하신지라

sentences.original_text: where people could rest on their journey
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들이 여행 중에 쉴 수 있는 곳이었습니다

sentences.original_text: and he wanted to kill Moses
